ROOT:
-- DaoT_CurrentWorkflow_D2_Select -- 2014/7/4 日立 太郎 SELECT [WorkflowControlNo], [HistoryNo], [WfPositionId], [FromUserId], [FromUserInfo], [ActionType], [ToUserId], [ToUserInfo], [NextWfPositionId], [ReserveArea], [ExclusiveKey], [ReplyDeadline], [CreatedDate], [AcceptanceDate] FROM [T_CurrentWorkflow]
WHERE AND [WorkflowControlNo] = @WorkflowControlNoAND [WorkflowControlNo] IS NULL AND [WorkflowControlNo] LIKE @WorkflowControlNo_Like AND [HistoryNo] = @HistoryNoAND [HistoryNo] IS NULL AND [HistoryNo] LIKE @HistoryNo_Like AND [WfPositionId] = @WfPositionIdAND [WfPositionId] IS NULL AND [WfPositionId] LIKE @WfPositionId_Like AND [FromUserId] = @FromUserIdAND [FromUserId] IS NULL AND [FromUserId] LIKE @FromUserId_Like AND [FromUserInfo] = @FromUserInfoAND [FromUserInfo] IS NULL AND [FromUserInfo] LIKE @FromUserInfo_Like AND [ActionType] = @ActionTypeAND [ActionType] IS NULL AND [ActionType] LIKE @ActionType_Like AND [ToUserId] = @ToUserIdAND [ToUserId] IS NULL AND [ToUserId] LIKE @ToUserId_Like AND [ToUserInfo] = @ToUserInfoAND [ToUserInfo] IS NULL AND [ToUserInfo] LIKE @ToUserInfo_Like AND [NextWfPositionId] = @NextWfPositionIdAND [NextWfPositionId] IS NULL AND [NextWfPositionId] LIKE @NextWfPositionId_Like AND [ReserveArea] = @ReserveAreaAND [ReserveArea] IS NULL AND [ReserveArea] LIKE @ReserveArea_Like AND [ExclusiveKey] = @ExclusiveKeyAND [ExclusiveKey] IS NULL AND [ExclusiveKey] LIKE @ExclusiveKey_Like AND [ReplyDeadline] = @ReplyDeadlineAND [ReplyDeadline] IS NULL AND [ReplyDeadline] LIKE @ReplyDeadline_Like AND [CreatedDate] = @CreatedDateAND [CreatedDate] IS NULL AND [CreatedDate] LIKE @CreatedDate_Like AND [AcceptanceDate] = @AcceptanceDateAND [AcceptanceDate] IS NULL AND [AcceptanceDate] LIKE @AcceptanceDate_Like
